fields.name: Parameters (start)
fields.value:
`format_version` - Always "1.16.100"
`identifier` - The identifier of the item in %s:%s format
`category` - The category of the item
`is_experimental` - Is the item experimental?
`texture_path` - Where the pack icon is placed in the output
`generate_item_atlas` - Generate item atlas as well
`display_name` - The name displayed on-screen
`max_stack_size` - The maximum stack size, integer input
`is_enchanted` - Should the item be displayed with foil?
`use_animation` - The animation used with the item
`use_duration` - Duration of item usage, decimal input
`stacked_by_data` - Is the item stacked by data?
`hand_equipped` - Is the item hand equipped?
`can_destroy_in_creative` - Can the item be destroyed in creative?
`creative_category` - The creative category of the item
`is_food` - Is the item food?
`food_nutrition` - Nutrition, decimal input, requires `is_food`
`food_saturation_modifier` - Saturation modifier, requires `is_food`
